I-Paris, 26 August (umphathi Ge Wenbo) ngo-26, u-Lu Shaye, isithunywa sikaShayina eFransi, waya ehlanganyela ngonyaka lweNhlangano yabasebenzi bamaFransi futhi wakhuluma ngemfazwe entsha yehlabathi kanye noMphathi-Prime Minister waseFransi uRafael lafane, uMbhathi-Prime Minister wakuqala wase-Italian letta, kanye nabanye abaqondisi bamaFrensi kanye nabafundi   U-Lu Shaye watshengisa ukuthi iShayina ayisiwo e-United States, futhi iShayina ayifuni ukuba yizwe eliyisibini lezwe. Manje amazwe ayavuma ukugcwalisa imisebenzi yayo yamazwe kanye nokususa eqembu, kodwa ayinanhloso yokubuyela ekufuneni i-hegemony.Ngenxa yokufuna i-hegemony, iChina isondela ukuphuhliswa kwezwe nokuphucula imigangatho yabantu.Uma u-China ehamba phambili manje, kusho ukuthi u-China uthuthukile kakhulu kunaphambili. Ngalokho-ke, wathatha imisebenzi eminingi yezwe lonke futhi wanikezela izithombe eziningi ezizweni zonke.Ukuphuhliswa kweShayina kuyithuba kunengozi kumazwe amanye.Isishini sisithungo esikhulu esinabasebenzisi abayi1.4 miliyardi. Ukuvulwa kwezwe kuzakukhuthazela ukubuyiswa kwezoqoqosho jikelele emva kwesifizi.
